response.overview: Aaron's father's funeral is today at the family home, and everything goes wrong: the funeral home delivers the wrong body, his cousin accidentally drugs her fiancé, and Aaron's successful younger brother, Ryan, flies in from New York, broke but arrogant. To top it all off, a mysterious stranger wants a word with Aaron.
response.title: Death at a Funeral

titles.title: Festa col morto - Il funerale è servito
デス・アット・ア・フューネラル

results.name: Watch the Death at a Funeral Trailer - In Theaters 4/16/10
